Perry) ; George Cole (Ronald) ; Michael Wilding (Alan Trently) ; Frank Cellier (John Forest) ; Muriel Aked (Miss Fernery) ; Wally Patch (Evans) ; Muriel George (Mrs. Trimm) ; Hay Petrie (Dr. Truscott) ; Catherine Lacey (Mrs. Stokes). 518 "Made at the Gaumont-British Studios, London." 520 Set during World War II, a Fifth Column organization plans to kidnap a scientist from his English country house laboratory. His assistant is suspected of passing secrets to the enemy. The plot twists and turns as all the characters come under suspicion in true thriller style. 541 0 PFA 1616-01-4166.
